<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Update an invoice group status"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"put"}
  path={"/api/2.0/crm/invoice/status/{status:[\\w\\d-]+}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Updates a status of invoices with the IDs specified in the request.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"invoiceids":{"description":"List of invoice IDs","type":"array","items":{"type":"integer","format":"int32"}},"status":{"description":"New invoice status","type":"integer"}}}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Invoice information","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object"}}}},"401":{"description":"Unauthorized"}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
